x-signed-message.description: JSON string containing timestamp and action. Format: {"action": "string", "ts": "Unix timestamp (seconds)", "walletAddress": "string", "isDelegate"?: boolean, "driftUserAccount"?: "string"}

get.description:
Establish a WebSocket connection to receive real-time market data updates from Drift protocol.

Candle Subscription

{ "type": "subscribe", "channelType": "candle", "symbol": "SOL-PERP", "resolution": "1" }

Market Subscription

{ "type": "subscribe", "channelType": "markets" }

Pricing Subscription

{ "type": "subscribe", "channelType": "pricing" }

Orderbook Subscription

{ "type": "subscribe", "channelType": "orderbook", "symbol":"<symbol>" }

User Subscription

{ "type": "subscribe", "channelType": "user", "accountId": "<accountId>" }

Notifications Subscription

{ "type": "subscribe", "channelType": "notifications", "authority": "<authorityId>" }
Fetch the AMM's position (inventory) over a specified time period.

parameters.name: marketName
parameters.description: The name of the market to get position data for (e.g., SOL-PERP)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start timestamp in seconds (must be less than end timestamp)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End timestamp in seconds (must be greater than start timestamp)

parameters.name: samples
parameters.description: Number of data points to return. The API will automatically calculate the appropriate step size between points. Maximum value is 11,000.

oneOf.description: Position value, in the market's base units

get.description:
Retrieve liquidations records, with optional pagination. Results are ordered from newest to oldest, with up to 20 unique liquidations per request.

Note: This endpoint provides records for the last 31 days.

Retrieve bankruptcy records, with optional pagination. Results are ordered from newest to oldest, with up to 20 unique bankruptcy per request.

Note: This endpoint provides records for the last 31 days.

Get rolling market volume data for specified interval
Get historical market volume data bucketed into 1-hour intervals. Time range must be between 1 and 24 hours (rounded down to nearest hour).
Get the 24-hour price change and percentage change for all markets.
Get average funding rates across multiple time periods for all markets
Get insurance fund revenue and market apy data
Get leaderboard entries with optional date and market filters.

parameters.description: UTC date string YYYY-MM-DD. Defaults to 7 Days prior

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: UTC date string YYYY-MM-DD. Defaults to today

This endpoint is currently in BETA and should only be used for test purposes

simulate.description: Whether to simulate transaction before returning (default: true)

This endpoint is currently in BETA and should only be used for test purposes

This endpoint is currently in BETA and should only be used for test purposes

simulate.description: Whether to simulate transaction before returning (default: true)

post.description:
This endpoint is currently in BETA and should only be used for test purposes
Build a transaction to cancel orders on Drift. If orderIds is provided, cancels specific orders. Otherwise, cancels all orders.

orderIds.description: Optional: Array of specific order IDs to cancel. If not provided, cancels all orders.

simulate.description: Whether to simulate transaction before returning (default: true)

tags.name: AMM
tags.description: Endpoints to fetch historical AMM data. For all AMM endpoints, the step size between data points is calculated automatically based on the requested number of `samples` (default = 11_000 max), with a minimum step size being 20 seconds. Thus the maximum queryable duration to still get a 20 second step size is about 220,000 seconds (approximately 2.54 days).
